name: Forever Burn
description: UNDERSTANDING THE ETERNAL FLAME AND THE SHRINKING OF CIRCULATING SUPPLY We are introducing a new innovative feature to the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem. The super burn acts like a deflationary mechanism built within the contract that burns through the pooled tokens to raise the floor price & marketcap on every buy and sell transaction through the block chain and during specific burn events. The burning mechanism is not a rebase as it will leave the total supply and your supply as a holder intact and only burn through the pooled tokens.
